tasks.task: Assessing corn yield potential after drought conditions.
subtasks: Observing heat scald and damaged leaves on corn plants.
Checking ear development and kernel integrity for yield estimation.
Noting soil conditions and plant population effects on yield.
Evaluating ear growth stage and potential yield losses.

tasks.task: Investigating hybrid performance in varying soil conditions.
subtasks: Comparing ear development between different hybrid samples.
Assessing the impact of soil depth and rock content on plant health.
Noting population density effects on overall hybrid performance.
